definition: to use discretion/to take circumstances into account/to make allowances pertinent to a situation
to pour wine/to drink wine/to deliberate/to consider
see 酌情辦理|酌情办理[zhuo2 qing2 ban4 li3]
to act after full consideration of the actual situation

definition: see 酌情辦理|酌情办理[zhuo2 qing2 ban4 li3]
(to do sth) separately/as a separate action
to add or subtract/to increase or decrease/to go up or go down
to assess punishment/to determine the sentence (on a criminal)
to report, requesting approval/written request for instructions
